title: Push Version 7 live and run post-deploy smoke checks

requirements.text: Promote the currently built Version 7 of the Keep Going Classes app to the live/production environment.
acceptanceCriteria: Version 7 is live and publicly accessible without deployment errors.
The live deployment serves the latest frontend and backend canister code for Version 7.

requirements.text: After Version 7 is live, perform a basic smoke test on the live environment covering public browsing, admissions submission, and Internet Identity login (including admin-only access control).
acceptanceCriteria: Public pages load successfully: Home (/), Articles (/articles), Courses & Exams (/courses-exams), YouTube (/youtube), Contact (/contact).
Submitting the Admissions form (/admissions) succeeds and shows the confirmation/success state.
Internet Identity login works end-to-end and admin routes remain protected (e.g., /admin, /admin/articles, /admin/admissions).

constraints: Do not modify any immutable frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Do not introduce new backend services; keep the single-actor Motoko architecture.
nonGoals: Adding new product features or changing UI/UX unrelated to deployment.
Changing article/admissions data models unless required to resolve a deployment blocker.
